title: CTRL0000928884 - Continued Interview of Cassidy Hutchinson, (June 20, 2022)

data.text: JANUARY 6TH ATTACK ON THE U.S. CAPITOL,
The interview in the above matter was held in Room HT-64A/B, The Capitol,
For the SELECT COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE
